name: VPN
description: Find a reputable VPN provider, to use on any public, shared or potentially insecure networks

name: HTTPS
description: Avoid entering data on any site that isn't secured via HTTPS, or use a browser extension such as HTTPS Anywhere

name: Block trackers
description: Install Privacy Badger to block spying ads and invisible trackers

name: Extensions
description: Be wary when installing new browser extensions, as there are malicious ones out there, and they can access everything you do on your browser

name: Incognito

name: Privacy Browsers
description: You could consider using a safer browser, such as Brave, Epic or Comodo Dragon. These browsers will disallow trackers, fingerprinting, cryptomining, ultrasound signalling and more
